entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 5:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with flurries and snow squalls beginning after midnight. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then southwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
